channel.title: NewYear on Dallas-FASCA - FASCA Dallas Chapter
channel.description: Recent content in NewYear on Dallas-FASCA - FASCA Dallas Chapter

item.title: Lunar New Year Celebration at Highland Springs
item.description: On Saturday, February 26, 18 FASCA students, 4 FASCA teachers, Teacher Yuh-Sin Lee, Teacher Eliza Tsai-lin, and the Carroll ISD Chinese club performed at Highland Springs Senior Living.

item.title: 2022 Southlake Spring Festival
item.description: The Southlake Spring Festival was a Lunar New Year centered community event held on February 20th, 2022 after being postponed by the snowstorm the previous Saturday.

item.title: 2022 Southlake Spring Festival
item.description: February 5, 2022, due to the winter storm affecting the DFW area, FASCA held another online Zoom practice for the Highland Springs Senior Living event scheduled for February 26th.

item.title: 2022 Dallas Chinese Community Center New Year Celebration
item.description: Today, we gathered together at the Dallas Chinese Community Center to celebrate New Yearâ€™s Day. FASCA students, parents, and staff attended the Raise the Flag and PVSA Award Ceremonies.
